original_title: ゴースト RE：BIRTH 仮面ライダースペクター
overview: A continuation from the Kamen Rider Ghost TV series, this is the story of Makoto, Alain, and Kanon who have traveled back to the Ganma World. It will explain the connection between Makoto and the Makoto doppelganger. Kanon’s secret will be revealed as well.
title: Kamen Rider Ghost RE:BIRTH - Kamen Rider Specter
